author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Worldwide infections approach 3 million mark
description: People who ignore quarantine in South Korea to be ordered to wear wristbands
content:
Coronavirus has infected more than 2.7 million people around the world, with the death toll passing 190,000.
Here are the latest updates on the pandemic from around the world:
Officials are to strap electronic wristbands on people who ignore home-quarantine… [+3556 chars]
